name: A. Bad Triangle
statement:
You are given an array a_1, a_2,
dots , a_n, which is sorted in non-decreasing order (a_i
le a_{i + 1}). Find three indices i, j, k such that 1
le i < j < k
le n and it is to construct a non-degenerate triangle (a triangle with
nonzero area) having sides equal to a_i, a_j and a_k (for example it is
possible to construct a non-degenerate triangle with sides 3, 4 and 5
but impossible with sides 3, 4 and 7). If it is impossible to find such
triple, report it.
